caption: Container
name: container
description: The Container object describes a specific instance of a container, which is a source of events.

hash.description: SHA256 hash of the container image. For example: 13550340a8681c84c861aac2e5b440161c2b33a3e4f302ac680ca5b686de48de.

image.description: The container image used as a template to run the container.

pod_id.description: The unique identifer of the pod (or equivalent) that the container is executing on.

tag.description: The tag used by the container. It can indicate version, format, OS.

uid.description: The full container unique identifier for this instantiation of the container. For example: ac2ea168264a08f9aaca0dfc82ff3551418dfd22d02b713142a6843caa2f61bf.
